items.text: runs the widish delivery outside off to third man for one

century No. 16 for Guptill, he raises the bat yet again and soaks in the applause from the crowd. Short of length towards leg and he works it off the hips and beat short fine leg behind square to get four
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: clips this one on middle and leg into the deep on leg again
bouncer this time to Williamson and he ducks under it easily. Called a wide
punch-driven through the covers by transferring his weight into the shot and he finds the gap by clearing cover to get three
he comes forward and rolls his wrists over that for one to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: full down leg and he sweeps that right in between deep square leg and short fine leg, the fielder in the deep gives it a try but is beaten
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: length on middle and leg and helped to leg off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: walks down this time and flicks it away to leg for one this time
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: goes forward and then back to adjust to the length and then blocks it back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, no run

items.text: straighter delivery outside off, pushed down to long-on
items.postText: Guptill's last nine innings: hundred, six scores below 20, and then two hundreds. He couldn't score much against India but has collected hundreds before and after that series
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Williamson, 1 run

items.text: pushed to mid-off, the fielder thinks he has a chance and has a shy at the non-striker's end (I think he made it) and since he doesn't hit, they take one for overthrow too
fuller delivery, one with scrambled seam around off, he blocks it back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: tight line around off again, he taps it to short third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Williamson, no run

items.text: 135kmh, almost in the block hole outside off, he digs it out to sweeper cover for one

items.preText: Imam : "None of the bowlers look like they can force a wicket here."
items.text: short and wide and Guptill absolutely crunches that with a slap over the covers, it the vacant area for a two-bounce boundary. He's hitting everything off the middle
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: walks across to off and then pushes the ball to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.preText:
Now Mahmudullah

Nitish: "Have to say that the "Nicholls as a back-up opener for the WC" experiment is starting to lose shape. NZ desperately need Munro to get back to form or simply hope that Nicholls comes good when it matter." Nicholls did get a fifty in the last match but couldn't score much against India, I agree
items.text: pretty slow outside off, cuts it to deep cover for one
very short and flat, he pulls it along the ground to deep midwicket
nicely flighted on a teasing length outside off, he leans into it and blocks
waits for it on the back foot this time to work it to deep midwicket
full toss outside off, Guptill is obviously going to smash it to the wide long-off boundary with a big swing. Not in the air though, this one rolls along the carpet smoothly
flighted full toss on leg this time and Mahmudullah is lucky he's swept it to fine leg for one

items.preText:
The asking rate has dipped under two per over now

Gareth: "Bangladesh just lucky they batted first. Guptill looking like he could top his high score today if it was a first innings. "
items.text: just back of length on off, taps it off the back foot for a quick single
width on the off side and that's eased into the covers easily
